      IJetAPIResponse sendPutShipOrder(String jetOrderId, ShipRequestRec req)
      The order shipped call is utilized to provide Jet with the SKUs that have been shipped or cancelled in an order, the tracking information, carrier information and any additional returns information for the order.

      • getOrderStatusTokens

        List<String> getOrderStatusTokens(OrderStatus status)
                           throws APIException,
                                  JetException
        Poll Jet and retrieve a list of order status tokens for doing stuff with orders. This will ONLY return the jet order id string, NOT the complete uri.
        Parameters:
        status - status to poll
        Returns:
        token list
        Throws:
        APIException
        JetException

      • getOrderStatusTokens

        List<String> getOrderStatusTokens(OrderStatus status,
                                  boolean includePath)
                           throws APIException,
                                  JetException
        Poll Jet and retrieve a list of order status tokens for doing stuff with orders.
        Parameters:
        status - status to poll
        includePath - If this is false, only the rightmost path part is returned from the uri.
        Returns:
        token list
        Throws:
        APIException
        JetException

      • sendPutAckOrder

        IJetAPIResponse sendPutAckOrder(String jetOrderId,
                                AckRequestRec req)
                         throws APIException,
                                JetException
        The order acknowledge call is utilized to allow a retailer to accept or reject an order. If there are any skus in the order that cannot be fulfilled then you will reject the order.
        Parameters:
        jetOrderId - Jet-defined order id
        req - The acknowledgement request to reply to jet with
        Returns:
        api response
        Throws:
        APIException
        JetException

      • sendPutShipOrder

        IJetAPIResponse sendPutShipOrder(String jetOrderId,
                                 ShipRequestRec req)
                          throws APIException,
                                 JetException
        The order shipped call is utilized to provide Jet with the SKUs that have been shipped or cancelled in an order, the tracking information, carrier information and any additional returns information for the order.
        Parameters:
        jetOrderId - Jet-defined order id
        req - shipment request
        Returns:
        api response
        Throws:
        APIException
        JetException
